description: Numbers n such that n and 7n + 4 are both prime.
mathematica: lst={}; Do[p=Prime[n]; If[PrimeQ[7*p+4],AppendTo[lst,p]],{n,6!}]; lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 16 2009 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..100000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(7*n+4)] // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 19 2010
author: _David W. Wilson_
